attributes.action: make the supermarkets fix their petrol prices nationwide
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: with fuel prices already so high i feel that the supermarkets should charge the same petrol prices at all outlets nationwide. Currently the fuel costs them the same price to buy and yet they charge as much as possible in any given area making the same fuel more expensive to some than others, this is price fixing at the pumps and should be stopped.
